body_html: This is why MetricSpec was dropped on the transition from tf.contrib.learn.Estimator to tf.estimator.Estimator. Instead, metrics are returned from the model_fn. If you switch to tf.estimator.Estimator and return your metrics from the model_fn this issue should go away.
body_text: This is why MetricSpec was dropped on the transition from tf.contrib.learn.Estimator to tf.estimator.Estimator. Instead, metrics are returned from the model_fn. If you switch to tf.estimator.Estimator and return your metrics from the model_fn this issue should go away.
body: This is why MetricSpec was dropped on the transition from tf.contrib.learn.Estimator to tf.estimator.Estimator. Instead, metrics are returned from the model_fn. If you switch to tf.estimator.Estimator and return your metrics from the model_fn this issue should go away.
